message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something fair. This is a good deal before inflation eats away at your share!
I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers, don't wait for inflation to get worse!
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm offering a slightly better deal. Let's settle this before inflation hurts you more!
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. Inflation is costing me!
Let's end this. An even split is the most logical choice. Take it before inflation makes your share even smaller!
